title: Dědkův dům
content:
Dědkův dům is found in the northeast part of the Bažiny, just off the Stará cesta. It is a modest dwelling on its own little island, which it shares with an outbuilding of some sort. This is where Dědek can be found, once he has been safely escorted on his pilgrimage to the Shrine of Melitele.

Úkoly
Tajemná věž
Rostliny
Feainnewedd
Květ dvouzubce
Bílá myrta
